item.title: The Book of Mormon, the Instrument to Gather Scattered Israel
item.description:
The Book of Mormon, the Instrument to Gather Scattered Israel by Elder C. Scott Grow, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 175th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2005
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder C. Scott Grow, Of the Seventy
